DO THIS!:
1.INSTALL GAME
2.RUN FROMDUST.EXE(FOR UPDATA)
3.COPY UbisoftGameLauncher(download crack) TO:
C:\ProgramFiles\Ubisoft\Ubisoft Game Launcher
4. RUN FROMDUST.EXE
5.CRETE ACCONT
6.SERIAL ARE RANDOM NUMBERS
7. PLAY!
